Name: Oops!!! I Slept With Your Mom
About the game: Baby lost Mommy when Baby was too young to remember Mommy 's face. But Baby remembers how warm and cuddly sleeping in Mommy 's hug felt. Now, Baby has to sleep with all the mommies in order to find Mommy. It could be any mommy. It could be your mommy... Oops!!! I Slept With Your Mom: A small indie title in which you must avoid obstacles and fight against enemies in order to reunite a baby with its mommy. It 's a pretty simple endless game which starts fairly easy and gets harder as you progress through the levels. Be it for wasting a little time or score chasing, mommies are waiting for you! Features 9 unlockable characters, all with their own special ability! Original hand drawn graphics. Original retro sound track. Randomized levels and enemies.
